Interface PlayerStateInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChooseWindowPatternState, FirstTurnState, NotYourTurnState, PlayerState, YourTurnState

    public interface PlayerStateInterface
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canEndTurn()
      returns true if the player can end his turn
      boolean canPlaceDie()
      returns true if the player has already placed a die in this turn
      boolean canUseTool()
      returns true if the player has already activated a tool card in this turn
      PlayerState cloneState()
      Clone the player state.
